name: The mind of a tired man
name_original: The mind of a tired man
description:
Play in the background :)

Our schedules are packed, our alarms set to 4 hours from when we manage to finish work for the day. Productivity is the mantra of today.

You have two options: continue struggling forward, heading inevitably to your collapse... or stop, look around, take a deep breath, and realize there is no point to anything, so we might as well take it easy.

Let's get a little existential in this simulation of a tired man's morning.

I made this about 4 years ago as one of the final projects for a game making class, but never shared it anywhere until now.
